content:
We want this meeting to be fun and engaging, but also to run smoothly and on time. Here are the basic Zoom etiquette rules we plan to follow.

  • Please keep your mics muted during talks, unless you've raised your hand and been acknowledged to ask a question.
  • But also, please consider keeping your camera on. It's nice to see faces!
  • Zoom chat will be restricted to hosts and speakers. If you want to discuss a particular talk (live or afterward), use a thread on Zulip. We'll use a new topic for each talk, and hope there will be lots of discussion.
  • Most talks will be 30 minutes: 25 for the speaker, and 5 for questions after. Some speakers may take questions during the talk, but by default, please save your questions for the end. We have a packed schedule and really want to stay on time.
